column5: Good news if you are looking for warranty work on your Lowrance.  Part of release from Radio World: Navico Appoints Radioworld Inc. of TorontoLowrance Authorized Warranty Service Centre Radioworld and Navico USA (Tulsa OK) is proud to announce that effective immediately, Radioworld Inc of Toronto is an Authorized Service Centre for Lowrance products.
Absolutely a great place to buy, now to get service on Your Lowrance products. Politics play such a large part in the service game. They deserve to be a service depot, for sure, IMO
great to hear  these guys are ham/Amateur radio technicians, so they really know electronics
